viewData.name: MSI 15.6" PS63 Modern Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy MSI 15.6" PS63 Modern Laptop featuring 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U Quad-Core, 16GB DDR4 | 512GB NVMe PCIe SSD 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Full HD IPS Display. Review MSI Modern
viewData.long_description: The 15.6" PS63 Modern Laptop from MSI is an all-purpose laptop designed to do a little bit of everything. It can easily tackle everyday tasks such as browsing the internet, composing and editing documents, streaming online videos, as well as more demanding ones like content creation and light gaming. Specs-wise, it's equipped with a 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U quad-core processor, 16GB of DDR4 memory, a 512GB NVMe PCIe SSD, and an NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050. Its 15.6" IPS display features a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution and has close to 100% sRGB coverage. Other integrated features include a microSD card reader, USB Type-A and Type-C ports, an HDMI port, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, a backlit keyboard, a webcam, microphone, speakers, and a combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.
